class.name: org.genedb.db.hibernate3gen.Cv
class.comment: A controlled vocabulary or ontology. A cv is composed of cvterms (aka terms, classes, concepts, frames) and the relationships between them

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the ontology. This corresponds to the obo-format -namespace-. cv names are unique

column.name: definition
column.comment: A description of the criteria for membership of this ontology

column.name: cv_id
column.comment: Closures will mostly be within one cv. If the closure of a relationship traverses a cv, then this refers to the cv of the object_id cvterm

column.name: cv_id
column.comment: The cv/ontology/namespace to which this cvterm belongs
